```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
# Set working directory
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = rprojroot::find_rstudio_root_file())
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rio)

# Files
## .dta files
acs_tract_09_file <-
  "./SGC/tract characteristics/ACS_2009_tract_CA_mani.dta"

acs_tract_10_file <-
  "./SGC/tract characteristics/ACS_2010_tract_CA_mani.dta"

acs_tract_13_file <-
  "./SGC/tract characteristics/ACS_2013_tract_CA_mani.dta"

acs_tract_16_file <-
  "./SGC/tract characteristics/ACS_2016_tract_CA_mani.dta"

acs_tract_18_file <-
  "./SGC/tract characteristics/ACS_2018_tract_CA_mani.dta"

census_tract_00_file <- 
  "./SGC/tract characteristics/Census_2000_tract_CA_mani.dta"
```

# Convert .dta tract characteristics data to .csv
```{r}
convert(acs_tract_09_file , "./SGC/acs_tract_09.csv")
convert(acs_tract_10_file , "./SGC/acs_tract_10.csv")
convert(acs_tract_10_file , "./SGC/acs_tract_13.csv")
convert(acs_tract_16_file , "./SGC/acs_tract_16.csv")
convert(acs_tract_18_file , "./SGC/acs_tract_18.csv")
convert(census_tract_00_file , "./SGC/census_tract_00.csv")
```
